stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes a similarity between Black women leaders of the mid-nineteenth century and those of the early twentieth century?

features.html:
Collection of the Smithsonian National Museum of African American History and Culture

1910 on the banner refers to the year the Oklahoma Federation of Colored Women’s Clubs was founded.

choicesHtml: The leadership of Black women was crucial in the building of strong African American communities.
Black women helped support the armed self-defense of many African American communities.
The leadership of Black women helped facilitate the migration of African American communities during the Great Migration.
Black women participated in local and state governments to address gender stereotypes faced by Black women.
